name: image-segmenter
description: This program demonstrates an interactive image segmentation technique using OpenCV.

name: Vibe-Visualizer
description: ðŸŽ§ A psychedelic real-time audio visualizer powered by your microphone. Built with p5.js, runs in the browser.

name: GestureOS
description: GestureOS is a Python-based gesture recognition system that lets you control your Windows PC with hand signs using your webcam. Perform actions like media control, mouse movement, tab switching, and more â€” all touch-free.

name: Object_Detection-OpenCV
description: Computer vision project for object detection using classic approach.

name: FactGCN
description: This project focuses on implementing FastGCN, a scalable alternative to traditional Graph Convolutional Networks (GCNs) that leverages importance sampling to improve efficiency. Additionally, we explore adaptive sampling techniques to further enhance accuracy and computational performance.

name: Emotion_Detection
description: This project uses OpenCV, Mediapipe, and DeepFace to detect faces and analyze emotions, age, gender, and race in real-time from video streams.

name: Weather-Classification
description: This project demonstrates a weather classification model using TensorFlow, applied to four different datasets: ACDC, MWD, UAVid, and Syndrone. The notebook provides a step-by-step approach to build, train, and evaluate a machine learning model to classify weather conditions using these datasets.

name: ROS-Intelligent-Robotics
description: This is a project for Intelligent Robotics course at unipd. Done with Robot Operating System (ROS) to control a robot in realworld, and simulated in Gazebo.

name: 3D-Data-Processing
description: This repo includes 4 projects on 3D data processing using opencv.

name: life
description: The Life Calendar project is a simple application purely for visulizing your age.

name: bone-age-prediction
description: Age prediction from bone X-Ray with deep learning.

name: GrayScale2RGB-GAN-Model
description: This project implements a GAN model for converting grayscale images to color.

name: Human-Voice-Gender-Detector
description: Real-time Gender and Age Recognition from Audio using CRNN
